docs.snippet: Kane, a Buffalo-born N.H.L. star, finds himself the subject of a criminal investigation into a rape allegation. But no one is talking much....
docs.lead_paragraph: Kane, a Buffalo-born N.H.L. star, finds himself the subject of a criminal investigation into a rape allegation. But no one is talking much.
docs.abstract: Michael Powell Sports of The Times column examines personal history of Chicago Blackhawks hockey star and perennial bad-boy Patrick Kane in light of recent rape allegations levied against him; suggests someone should have discussed his reckless path with him and mentored Kane before this recent turn of events.

headline.main: Patrick Kane’s Status Is Shrouded in Silence
headline.print_headline: The Winner, the Character, the Accused

docs.snippet: A small community college in Ohio is banking on its newly created football team to boost school spirit and enrollment. In turn, its starting quarterback — a former high school player convicted in a notorious rape case — is banking on t...
docs.lead_paragraph: A small community college in Ohio is banking on its newly created football team to boost school spirit and enrollment. In turn, its starting quarterback — a former high school player convicted in a notorious rape case — is banking on this school that took him when others wouldn't.
